content:
DatabaseOperationsExtensions DatabaseOperationsExtensions Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.Sql
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.Sql.dll

The Windows Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Windows Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases and servers.

Edit

In this Article

public static class DatabaseOperationsExtensions : objectPublic Module DatabaseOperationsExtensions
    Inherits Object

BeginCreateOrUpdate(IDatabaseOperations, String, String, String, DatabaseCreateOrUpdateParameters) BeginCreateOrUpdate(IDatabaseOperations, String, String, String, DatabaseCreateOrUpdateParameters)

Edit

Begins creating a new Azure SQL Database or updating an existing Azure SQL Database. To determine the status of the operation call GetDatabaseOperationStatus.

public static DatabaseCreateOrUpdateResponse BeginCreateOrUpdate(this IDatabaseOperations operations, string resourceGroupName, string serverName, string databaseName, DatabaseCreateOrUpdateParameters parameters)<ExtensionAttribute>

IDatabaseOperations IDatabaseOperations

resourceGroupName
String String

serverName

databaseName
String String

Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database to be operated on (Updated or created).

parameters

Required. The required parameters for creating or updating a database.

Returns
